ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EQ Monks] An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: yes the claws that come from the AoF, thats what I was talking about. but they are 1hs like you pointed out. As for nunchuck s they could be 1hb. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
yes the claws that come from the AoF, thats what I was talking about. but
they are 1hs like you pointed out. As for nunchuck's they could be 1hb.



----- Original Message -----
From: Greg Jordon <greg@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 12:41 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Re: [EQ Monks] An idea for the slow day


> From: "Greg Jordon" <greg@...>
>
>
>
> Actually, there is a claw fisted sort of weapon, looks like a
plate
> glove with 3 or 4 blades coming out of it. But its a 1 hand slashing
> weapon. Really expensive, I think.... But still, something like that
that
> had charges of poison or some other spell that could be refilled with a
> special item would be really interesting.. (For instance, serum of
slowness,
> that would DOT and slow the creature down, and would require some item
> gained off a creature to replenish.) Monks are indefinitely cool, but we
> could all use a refreshing new addition. Maybe a cool graphic for our
> sashes/headbands would be good too..... And a manuever that tosses your
> enemy back would be good for feigning. Nail em away then walk off a few
> steps and feign. You could get it at 15 or something and the distance you
> throw the enemy could be skill based... And quite considerable at high
> levels. =)
>
> Also.... Is there anyone out there who plays Xegony who is
absolutely
> swamped with spare platinum and has nothing to do with it? I need armor
so
> badly... things that con white to me may as well con red..
>
>
> Darkanano, 8th circle monk, Newbie Of Eternity, of Xegony.....
>
>
